item.title: Why Ukraine's first lady wrote Melania Trump a letter
item.description: Ukraine's First Lady Olena Zelenska has thanked US First Lady Melania Trump for imploring Vladimir Putin to protect children.

item.title: What to know as Air Canada says it will resume flights
item.description: Air Canada and the union representing its cabin crew have reached a tentative deal, with plans to resume flying Tuesday evening.

item.title: Son of Norway's crown princess charged with rape and abuse
item.description: Marius Borg HÃ¸iby is charged with 32 offences and could face up to 10 years in prison if found guilty.

item.title: Texas police hunt convict 'mistakenly' freed from jail
item.description: Police say the man was sentenced to jail for assaulting a family member and evading arrest.

item.title: Mediators await Israeli response to new Gaza ceasefire proposal
item.description: Qatar says it is "almost identical" to a US proposal for a 60-day truce, during which around half of 50 hostages would be released.
